desc: Canadian Flower Farm. Shop for flowers in Canada, tulips, narcissus, anemones, peonies, fall bulbs, seeds, dahlias, ranunculus. Specialty flowers and unique flower varieties for Canadian gardeners who want to grow something beautiful. Dawn Cosgrove of Whistling Prairie Flowers @farmgirlsk

layout.text: We educate, inspire and provide unique & hard to find varieties to Canadian gardeners so that they can feel empowered to grow something beautiful, right in their own backyards
